abstract: Teenagers always seem to be hungry, but they also always seem to be busy, with no time to eat. Martha Rose Shulman offers a solution in this week's Recipes for Health: tasty and nutritious cookies and bars that busy teenagers can eat on the run.
snippet: Teenagers always seem to be hungry, but they also always seem to be busy, with no time to eat. Martha Rose Shulman offers a solution in this week's Recipes for Health: tasty and nutritious cookies and bars that busy teenagers can eat on the run.

headline.main: Feeding Teenagers With Cookies and Bars
